```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

## store file

```{r}
library(filestorer)
test = 'hello world'
status = store(file = test, token = 'jafkahfiucsjsjafofa')
if (status == 0){
  message('file have been saved')
}
```


## get file back
```{r}
library(filestorer)
test = getback('text', token = 'jafkahfiucsjsjafofa')
if (status == 0){
  message('file have been saved')
}
test
```
